headline: Timeline: June 7th shooting in Santa Monica
text: The incident began shortly before noon on Friday at a Santa Monica residence, where shots were reported and a house was on fire. As the house burst into flames, the man, wearing what appeared to be a ballistic jacket, carjacked a woman at gunpoint and directed her to drive to the college campus, having her stop so he could shoot along the way. In all, at least 5 were left dead and several injured. Here's a timeline of Friday's events.
